intro: Solanum kenoyeri, commonly known as Kenoyeri nightshade, is a flowering plant native to the Philippines. It belongs to the Solanaceae family, which includes other well-known plants like tomatoes and peppers. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. Its leaves are ovate to elliptical in shape, with a rough texture, and it produces small, yellowish-green flowers. The fruit is a globose berry that turns red when mature, containing several seeds.
